ATTACHMENT ID: 12909501 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

I am not clear about the change related to lockForUpdate.

If you closeall for the query, will you release the lock acquired by the query too?
[~ychena] The lock is held till the end of transaction, not till the end of the query.
By theory, it is. Just to double check, for our pattern to close query is after the transaction committed. And it is not difficult to hold the for update query until end of transaction to close.
Pushed to master. Thanks [~ychena] for reviewing.

[~aihuaxu]
Looks like this needs to be marked as resolved with a fix version ?
Yes. Thanks for reminding. I forgot to resolve it.
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
